title: Types of Plumbing Services We Offer
p: Ben Franklin Plumbing Helps You with All Your Plumbing Projects including:

lists.title: Drain Cleaning & Unclogging
lists.description: Clogged drains can cause major disruptions. Our expert team provides thorough drain cleaning services to keep your pipes clear and your water flowing freely.

lists.title: Leak Detection & Repair
lists.description: Hidden leaks can cause significant damage. Our advanced tools help us quickly detect and repair leaks to prevent costly water damage.

lists.title: Water Heater Installation & Repair
lists.description: Whether it’s a traditional tank water heater or a tankless model, we offer reliable installation and repair services to ensure your home has consistent hot water.

lists.title: Sewer Line Repair & Replacement
lists.description: We offer professional sewer line repair and replacement services to maintain the integrity of your plumbing system and avoid major plumbing issues down the line.

lists.title: Pipe Replacement & Re-piping
lists.description: Over time, pipes can degrade. We provide pipe replacement and re-piping services to ensure your plumbing system is running efficiently and safely.

lists.title: Toilet Repair & Installation
lists.description: Whether it’s a simple repair or a full toilet replacement, our team ensures your toilets function properly and are installed with care.

lists.title: Faucet & Sink Repair & Installation
lists.description: Dripping faucets and clogged sinks can be frustrating. We repair and install faucets, sinks, and other fixtures to ensure smooth operation and prevent water waste.

lists.title: Plumbing Inspections
lists.description: Preventative maintenance is key. Our plumbing inspections identify potential problems before they become major issues, saving you time and money in the long run.

lists.title: New Construction Plumbing Installation
lists.description: Building a new home or commercial space? We provide expert plumbing installation services for new constructions, ensuring everything is done right from the start.

lists.title: Garbage Disposal Repair & Installation
lists.description: Whether your garbage disposal is jammed or you need a new one installed, we handle all your disposal needs with quick, reliable service.

lists.title: Water Softener Installation & Repair
lists.description: Hard water can cause a variety of issues. We install and repair water softeners to help protect your plumbing system and improve water quality.

lists.title: Backflow Prevention & Testing
lists.description: Protect your water supply with our backflow prevention and testing services. We ensure your plumbing complies with regulations to avoid contamination.

lists.title: Sump Pump Installation & Repair
lists.description: Prevent flooding with a properly installed and maintained sump pump. We offer installation and repair services to ensure your basement remains dry during heavy rainfall.

lists.title: Gas Line Services
lists.description: Whether you need new gas lines installed or an existing line repaired, we provide expert gas line services to ensure safety and efficiency in your home.

lists.title: Shower & Bathtub Repair & Installation
lists.description: We handle all your shower and bathtub needs, from repairing leaks to installing new units, ensuring your bathroom remains functional and stylish.

lists.title: Water Line Services
lists.description: From new water line installations to repairs, we provide expert services to ensure a steady and safe water supply to your home or business.
